oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: M. S. Freeman and Rockwell Potter correspondence, 1933 October
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Freeman, M. S.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Mrs. M. S. Freeman to Mrs. Martin enclosing a letter from Rockwell Potter, the President of the American Board of Commissions for Foreign Missions, appointing Mr. and Mrs. Freeman and Dr. William W. Peck to represent the Board at the commemoration of the Brainerd Mission cemetery.
